errors.error_description: In the `pyproject.toml` example, the dev dependencies are defined under `[tool.poetry.dev-dependencies]`, which is a deprecated syntax. The correct modern syntax is `[tool.poetry.group.dev.dependencies]`.
In the 'Related Projects' section, the URL for `poetry-core` incorrectly points to a subpath of the main poetry repository (`.../poetry/core`) instead of its own repository (`.../poetry-core`).
correction_candidates: Change the link text to `poetry/core` to match the incorrect URL.
Remove the `poetry-core` project from the list.
